value.Error Message: Get many workflows returned 0 workflows. API may have failed or instance has no workflows.

parameters.text:
=üö® *n8n Backup CRITICAL FAILURE* ‚Äî {{ $now.setZone('Asia/Kolkata').format('yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') }}

*Folder:* `{{ $('Set Variables1').item.json.folderName }}`
*Error:* No workflows were returned by the n8n API.

Possible causes:
‚Ä¢ n8n API credential has expired
‚Ä¢ Instance has no active workflows
‚Ä¢ n8n API is unreachable

*Action required:* Please check your n8n instance immediately.
üìã <https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1k3t3DiZNyv_w1IZosd9Kw1Xo4Hq0LUc6pZLIkFBUVH4|View Error Log>

value.Error Message: ={{ $json.error.message ?? 'Unknown error fetching workflows from n8n API' }}

assignments.name: isInterrupted
assignments.value: ={{ ($('Get many workflows1').all().length - $input.all().filter(i => i.json['Status'] === 'error' && i.json['Error Type'] !== 'readme_creation_failure').length) < $('Get many workflows1').all().length && $input.all().filter(i => i.json['Status'] === 'error').length > 0 }}

parameters.text:
=‚úÖ *n8n Backup Completed Successfully* ‚Äî {{ $now.setZone('Asia/Kolkata').format('yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') }} IST

*Folder:* `{{ $json.folderName }}`
*Started:* {{ $json.startTime }}

*Summary:*
‚Ä¢ üì¶ Total Workflows: {{ $json.totalFetched }}
‚Ä¢ ‚úÖ All workflows uploaded successfully
‚Ä¢ üìÅ GitHub: <https://github.com/sidhartha1s/n8n-workflows-backup|View Repository>

nodes.name: Set SHA (File Exists)
nodes.notes: File exists ‚Üí extract SHA from Get File response

nodes.name: Set SHA (New File)
nodes.notes: File does not exist (404) ‚Üí no SHA needed, create new

nodes.name: Merge SHA Paths
nodes.notes: chooseBranch: passes whichever SHA path (exists or new) fires, no wait

nodes.name: Aggregate Rows
nodes.notes: Collapses all 30+ sheet rows into ONE single item containing arrays. Set node now runs once.

nodes.name: Slack ‚Äî Error Summary
nodes.notes: Clean one-line summary. Only fires ONCE now.

nodes.name: Global Error Trigger
nodes.notes: Catches unhandled workflow crashes. This is a separate mini-workflow island within the same JSON.

value.Error Message: Get many workflows returned 0 workflows. API may have failed or instance has no workflows.

parameters.text:
=üö® *n8n Backup CRITICAL FAILURE* ‚Äî {{ $now.setZone('Asia/Kolkata').format('yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') }} IST

*Folder:* `{{ $('Set Variables3').item.json.folderName }}`
*Error:* No workflows were returned by the n8n API.

Possible causes:
‚Ä¢ n8n API credential expired
‚Ä¢ Instance has no active workflows
‚Ä¢ n8n API unreachable

*Action:* Check your n8n instance immediately.
üìã <https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1k3t3DiZNyv_w1IZosd9Kw1Xo4Hq0LUc6pZLIkFBUVH4|View Error Log>

value.Error Message: ={{ $json.error.message ?? 'Unknown error fetching workflows from n8n API' }}

parameters.text:
=üö® *n8n Backup CRITICAL FAILURE* ‚Äî {{ $now.setZone('Asia/Kolkata').format('yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') }} IST

*Folder:* `{{ $('Set Variables3').item.json.folderName }}`
*Error:* Failed to fetch workflows from n8n API.
*Details:* {{ $('Log API Fetch Error2').item.json['Error Message'] }}

*Action:* Backup did not run. Check n8n API credentials.
üìã <https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1k3t3DiZNyv_w1IZosd9Kw1Xo4Hq0LUc6pZLIkFBUVH4|View Error Log>

nodes.name: Split Workflows3
nodes.notes: batchSize=10000 ensures output[0] fires exactly ONCE after all workflows processed

nodes.name: Get File SHA1
nodes.notes: If file exists: returns sha. If 404: error path = new file.

nodes.name: Upload to GitHub3
nodes.notes: GitHub edit operation: if sha provided = update, if empty = create. One node handles both.

nodes.name: Merge Loop Paths2
nodes.notes: chooseBranch: passes whichever path (success or error) arrives, loop continues immediately

nodes.name: Create README3
nodes.notes: Triggered by Split output[0] (done) after ALL workflows processed. Reads error log to compute success/fail counts.

nodes.name: Merge Finalize2
nodes.notes: chooseBranch: passes whichever README path (success or error) arrives

nodes.name: Read Today Error Log2
nodes.notes: Reads all rows for today's backup folder. Returns one item per row (potentially 30+ items).

assignments.name: isInterrupted
assignments.value: ={{ ($('Get many workflows3').all().length - $json['Error Type'].filter((t, i) => $json['Status'][i] === 'error' && t !== 'readme_creation_failure').length) < $('Get many workflows3').all().length && $json['Status'].filter(s => s === 'error').length > 0 }}

nodes.name: Aggregate Results2
nodes.notes: Now runs ONCE (not 31 times) because Aggregate collapsed all rows into 1 item with arrays

nodes.name: Slack ‚Äî Success Summary2
nodes.notes: Clean success message. Only fires ONCE.
